title: Wall Street Breakfast October 11:  Key Union Rejects Deal With Freight Railroads
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Key union rejects deal with freight railroads. JPMorgan's Jamie Dimon sees recession starting in next 6-9 months, markets could get 'disorderly'. Ex-Fed chair Ben Bernanke: U.S. not in anything like dire straits seen in 2008. Nissan to book ~$687M loss as it sells Russian business for €1. Catch today’s WSB article https://seekingalpha.com/wsb. Start Your Free Trial of Seeking Alpha Premium - https://bit.ly/3uX5TDY.
